page.title: 10 TUESDAY TEA CLUB
page.content:
The Ash Tuesday Tea Club meets on Tuesday afternoons at 2:00p.m. until 4:00p.m. Approximately 28 people are in the Tuesday Tea Club.You don't have to pay a fee to join,you just pay 30p each time you come. The Ash Tuesday Tea Club has been running for three and a half years.The club members play cards,bingo and bagatelle. The club started in 1982 when they decided to meet at the Ash Pavillion. The club have special events like Christmas Parties.
Anna Pullen, Susan Mosedale, Laura Batstone.
